title: Chiral Fermions and AdS/CFT Duality for a Nonabelian Orbifold
abstract: We present what we believe is the minimal three-family $AdS/CFT$ model compactified on a nonabelian orbifold $S^{5}/(Q\times Z_{3})$. Nontrivial irreps of the discrete nonabelian group $Q\times Z_{3}$ are identified with the $4$ of $SU(4)$ $R$ symmetry to break all supersymmetries, and the scalar content of the model is sufficient to break the gauge symmetry to the standard model. According to the conformality hypothesis the progenitor $SU(4)^3 \times SU(2)^{12}$ theory becomes conformally invariant at an infra-red fixed point of the renormalization group.
